name: Just for the Halibut Online Trivia | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: What route will you be taking?
questions.explanation:
Trout.

	WhaT ROUTe will you be taking? There are many types of trout, both freshwater and saltwater. Most trout have teeth that grow from the roof of their mouths called vomerine teeth. The age of a trout can be told by counting the growth rings on its scales.

questions.text: Ralph puts almonds on his tacos.
questions.explanation:
Salmon.

	Ralph putS ALMONds on his tacos. Salmon are a pink-fleshed fish that can be found in both freshwater and saltwater. They are one of the healthiest fish on the market and can be bought fresh or canned. Salmon are an important species to the ecology of the Pacific Northwest and Alaska where they are a primary food source bears, birds, and otters.

Carp.

	Where is your CAR Parked? Found in both Europe and North America, carp are an oily freshwater fish and are known for being very adaptable. They are able to survive in water that is frozen on top as long as there is moving water underneath. They are a social fish and are often found in large schools.

questions.text: She polished her ring before the wedding.
questions.explanation:
Herring.

	She polished HER RING before the wedding. Herring is one of the most popular fish on the planet. The live in huge schools and are found in most of the world's oceans. Herring are one of the most healthy fish to cook and can be smoked, pickled, fried or grilled. Their eggs are also very popular.

questions.text: I gave out one candy per child.
questions.explanation:
Perch.

	I gave out one candy PER CHild. Perch are a popular freshwater game fish. They are a carnivorous fish that are usually found in small lakes, rivers, and streams. Fisherman love them as they put up a good fight and they make a good meal.

questions.text: He proposed to Flo underneath the bridge.
questions.explanation:
Flounder.

	He proposed to FLO UNDERneath the bridge. Flounder are a type of flatfish that are found lying on the bottom of the ocean floor. Born with an eye on each side of its head, by the time the flounder is an adult, one of the eyes has migrated so that both eyes are on the side of the fish that faces up. This carnivorous fish has had its populations threatened due to overfishing.

questions.text: I had docked the boat for repair.
questions.explanation:
Haddock.

	I HAD DOCKed the boat for repair. Haddock are usually found in deeper parts of the North Atlantic where their habitat is the dark, cold waters. The overfishing of haddock has led to a population decline. Their mild, white flesh make them very popular on both sides of the Atlantic.

Tuna.

	Don't leT UNAnswered questions wait.The ocean-dwelling tuna is eaten all over the world. They can be found in all the oceans on the planet. Their popularity has led to them being one of the most industrially farmed fish to be consumed. The tuna is known for being wily and hard to catch.

Eel.

	I don't fEEL good. There are over 800 species of eel. This edible fish can be found in all the oceans of the world. They are an important food source in many parts of the world. Some species of this elongated fish can grow as long as 13ft. (4m).

questions.text: The bursar dined on steak and potatoes.
questions.explanation:
Sardine.

	The burSAR DINEd on steak and potatoes. Sardine is a term that is thought to be derived from the Italian island of Sardinia, a location where these small, oily fish were once abundant. There are many species of sardines and all live in large schools which can number in the thousands. They are one of the most commonly eaten fish in the world.
